job_description:
1.     To prepare budgets for the graphic design maintenance and operate within approved budged.
2.     To ensure the quality of all graphic design as like material promotion, flier, brocure, web sign 
        product identity, back drop etc.
3.     To maintain all graphic design property for properly.
4.     Coordinate with all department for providing graphic design
5.     Assist in hundling Artman, included in the filling decoration.
6.     Perform all task wich assigned.
